dcterms:creator: Mattia Antonino Di Gangi
Roldano Cattoni
Luisa Bentivogli
Matteo Negri
Marco Turchi
dcterms:description: MuST-C is a multilingual speech translation corpus created to facilitate the training of end-to-end systems for spoken language translation from English into 8 languages, comprising at least 385 hours of audio recordings from English TED Talks, aligned at the sentence level with their manual transcriptions and translations.
dcterms:title: MuST-C

dcterms:creator: Jan Niehues
Roldano Cattoni
Sebastian Stükker
Mauro Cettolo
Marco Turchi
Marcello Federico
dcterms:description: The IWSLT 2018 corpus is a dataset used for evaluating spoken language translation systems, built from TED Talks with a focus on segment extraction and alignment based on time information.
dcterms:title: IWSLT18

dcterms:creator: Matt Post
Gaurav Kumar
Adam Lopez
Damianos Karakos
Chris Callison-Burch
Sanjeev Khudanpur
dcterms:description: The Fisher and Callhome Spanish–English Speech Translation Corpus is a dataset aimed at improving speech-to-text translation, widely used in previous research.
dcterms:title: Fisher and Callhome Spanish–English Speech Translation Corpus

dcterms:creator: Claudio Bendazzoli
Annalisa Sandrelli
dcterms:description: EPIC (European Parliament Interpreting Corpus) is a dataset developed for corpus-based interpreting studies.
dcterms:title: EPIC

dcterms:creator: Christian Federmann
William D Lewis
dcterms:description: The Microsoft Speech Language Translation (MSLT) Corpus is a dataset for English, French, and German, released for the IWSLT 2016 evaluation.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Speech Language Translation (MSLT) Corpus

dcterms:creator: Christian Federmann
William D Lewis
dcterms:description: The Microsoft Speech Language Translation (MSLT) Corpus for Chinese and Japanese provides conversational test data for machine translation and speech recognition.
dcterms:title: Microsoft Speech Language Translation (MSLT) Corpus for Chinese and Japanese

dcterms:creator: Sebastian Stüker
Florian Kraft
Christian Mohr
Teresa Herrmann
Eunah Cho
Alex Waibel
dcterms:description: The KIT Lecture Corpus is a dataset designed for speech translation, containing lectures for research purposes.
dcterms:title: KIT Lecture Corpus

dcterms:creator: Marcely Zanon Boito
Antonios Anastasopoulos
Marika Lekakou
Aline Villavicencio
Laurent Besacier
dcterms:description: A Small Griko-Italian Speech Translation Corpus is a dataset aimed at providing resources for speech translation between Griko and Italian.
dcterms:title: Griko-Italian Speech Translation Corpus
